# FCSUtils

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A package to assist in the development of other packages in R. This package uses other packages that already helped in the development like `devtools`, `usethis`, `cli` and `littleboxes`.

## Installation

You can install the released version of FCSUtils from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("FCSUtils")
```

Or get the development version from GitHub:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("fcsest/FCSUtils")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(FCSUtils)
## basic example code
```
